name: Chenkai Weng
content: Chenkai Weng Chenkai Weng (翁晨凯) School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence Arizona State University [CV] [Google Scholar] [DBLP] I'm an Assistant Professor of Computer Science at Arizona State University. My interest lies in applied cryptography, with focus on secure multi-party computation and zero-knowledge proofs. Articles in Refereed Conferences Committed Vector Oblivious Linear Evaluation and Its Applications Yunqing Sun, Hanlin Liu, Kang Yang, Yu Yu, Xiao Wang, Chenkai Weng CCS 2025 [eprint] On Large
